website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL headphone pair offers a refined audio experience in a stylish design.
pros: Crisp, refined audio performance with a clear, distortion-free bass response
cons: Not for those seeking booming bass

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones a year and so ago and I can say they are of reasonable quality, The cable has worn down but as it is detachable you can easily find other cables that fit fr cheaper than £20 but it is worth getting the same cable for the headphones. the sounds quality is brilliant, the headphones are not too deafening, the are comfy to wear for long periods of time. They are well packaged, clean and easy to fold up and put away, easy to clean and it comes with a nice bag to keep them in. all in all great product would buy again but their is no real point in doing so
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are super earphones, really comfortable and great quality sound. Only giving four stars because the first set were faulty and would only play sound from one earphone. That said it was easy to send them back, there were no quibbles and the replacement pair arrived in two days. They really are fabulous quality so despite the initial hiccup I would still highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Good audio quality but the pads started to fall apart after 1 year and recently the left speaker broke. I used them carefully and only at home, also it just stopped working without reasons, after few hundreds hours of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Truly excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A truly excellent product with first rate sound reproduction and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus the Red

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality if you have the money, but there are better value ones for far less
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive headphones ive ever bought and was very cautious about buying them, having taken the plunge they are extremely good value and supremely comfortable with amazing sound quality however I cant escape the feeling these (while great) don't quite justify their price tag
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tidmarsh

customer_reviews.title: As you would expect from Sennheiser top quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Even after extended periods of wearing still comfortable Sound is crisp and clear
customer_reviews.author: Colm Moloney

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones for £99
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones for £99, not too heavy and thoroughly impressed with their noise cancellation (unexpected but appreciated), however the noise leakage with these headphones I would say is pretty terrible but for the price, I can complain. Overall great product, great brand, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of headphones before settling on these, I am very happy with them, I would definitely recommend for anyone who wants done great headphones fire a good price. They do noise cancel a little bit it's not amazing bit they do not leak sound at all
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great! Definitely a good buy. I have a small head and they fit fine. I have, however, pinched my finger twice when opening them. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: the headphones sound really good, even when listening from phoen
customer_reviews.text: the headphones sound really good, even when listening from phoen, but the rubber on the headband is kinda coming off a bit, but it may do that because i used them in rain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang on point
customer_reviews.text: Not as tight fitting as beats by dr.dre better sound altough if you preffer loudness would be better to get a portable amp if your using a ipod/phone overall good quality no complaits other than only one lead
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: You can always rely on sennheiser.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, can always rely on sennheiser, also own the HD 558's absolutely amazing for gaming. One gripe I have is, i'd have liked another cable in the box, without the inline remote, other than that these are just great, very well made and sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: M. McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Love the olive pair I got. They feel sturdy but still soft and comfortable. The sound quality is great. They arrived quickly and in a sealed sennheiser box. Very pleased. I also like how the cable is detachable meaning it could easily be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your left ear doesn't work: check if the wire is plugged correctly
customer_reviews.text: It appeared not to work: the left ear was silent. Just like many of the one star reviews, but when I checked again and played with the wire, it clicked deeper into the earphones and now works perfectly. Sorry for 'liking' the one star reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love them: )
customer_reviews.text: first pair of proper over head phones. love them :)
customer_reviews.author: L Hopley

customer_reviews.title: Over hyped, get the Momentums instead
customer_reviews.text: Of my brief few hours with the Urbanite XL, alongside about the same amount of burn in these are definitely over priced and they under perform. There is so much mid bass bleed into the mids that any sort of music sounds contested and undecipherable. Treble is way too relaxed which reveals not a lot of detail. The isolation/noise leakage is average. Comfort is not that great, the pads aren't the softest and makes your ears hurt. The only real good thing the Urbanites have going for them is their build quality. The way the cable slides into each ear cup when they are adjusted is unique and clever.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound quality and the way they fold makes them easy to carry Overall, I've never had any on ear phones that gave me better sound from the top end right through to base, with great reproduction overall. Weaknesses? None with the phones but the carry bag is cheap and almost useless. But serves a purpose. The way the cable clips into the phones is a trick to work out and master, but effective thereafter. But is it robust? Would I buy them again? Absolutely yes.
customer_reviews.author: CMEdinburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, just don't move your head.
customer_reviews.text: Stuck with the Sennheiser brand as I have done over many years. Great sound quality as usual, which obviously depends on the quality of the source you are listening to. Would have a 5 Star if it wasn't for the fact that they are not very secure at all, to the point where I wish I chose a different model. Any slight movement of the head while listening, like virtual drumming, they fall off your head! Plus the cable could be slightly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: Bass quality is great, they're even slightly noise cancelling because they're over-ear
customer_reviews.text: Bass quality is great, they're even slightly noise cancelling because they're over-ear. Only point to make it they really do mean XL, they look a bit too big if you have a small head like me, but they're so comfy (can literally wear them for hours without my ears hurting) and the sound quality is so good I don't really mind that they look too big.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Absolute steal
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are not only beautiful but they are comfortable and the sound quality is impeccable and as a musician I really appreciate the well balanced EQ and beautiful warmness of the sound Plus they make good ear muffs or the winter months best pair of headphones I have ever owned by a long shot and at a very good price
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 months ago and I am really happy with this product. Super sound quality, very good middle bass and crispy sound. perfect materials used.. Can bend however you want, but won't break them. I really recomend to everyone who wants good headphones for good price.
customer_reviews.author: Fajtaa

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are pretty god for that prise,there is one problem only I changed 4th cable and thay cost £20 each
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very clear and balanced.You are able to hear the creaking of the violin chord.The headphones are pretty god for that prise.
customer_reviews.author: Tihomir

customer_reviews.title: the sound was excellent, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I found these far to heavy for my head, the sound was excellent, but not for me, so returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. A. Skipp

customer_reviews.title: mediocre for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these is reasonable, but not mind blowing, considering the price. They're heavy and not very comfortable over long periods, and the build quality is so-so, with both earpads having broken and needed to be replaced within a year of purchase. They aren't terrible, they just don't offer much that can't be found at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: C.F.Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Had these headphones for 9 months and they are on the way out music cuts every time I move my head. No obvious way to return goods under 12 months statuary warranty on Amazon. Really disappointed never buying another Sennheiser product again.
customer_reviews.author: alasdair crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. But the ear leather has starting broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. But the ear leather has starting broken in a couple of uses. Very disappointing. But it is a great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: great tone. only small snag is that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: great tone. only small snag is that I have a small head so it is set on the smallest adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: KatieD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son is delighted with his headphones, and that they came so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser Urbanite XL Over-Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of these headphones is legendary. They look awesome and the sound just fine
customer_reviews.author: Ngosa Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not for me..
customer_reviews.text: If you're after a pair of bass-heavy headphones that look great, these might be for you. If you're after something a bit more well balanced that offer more comfort, look elsewhere. I tried watching a movie and by the end my ears hurt a bit, these are not designed for long listening sessions. The bass is great but the mids and highs feel watered down and weak; disappointing for the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: was pretty unimpressed with the quality of the sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a replacement for my Sony MDR-V55R's but to be honest, once comparing them together, was pretty unimpressed with the quality of the sound and bass, which apparently was supposed to be a key feature of these headphones, so I sent them back and ordered the Audio-Technica ATH-M50X's instead. They sound MUCH better and for basically the same price. Wouldn't recommend these. They look good and are a good set of headphones for hands free talking but in all honesty, aren't worth the price you pay for them. Just my 2 cents.
customer_reviews.author: Olliemad

customer_reviews.title: It still works for audio but the remote is gone due to a bad connection. At 20£ it is not worth replacing ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use the cable's remote control died on me. It still works for audio but the remote is gone due to a bad connection . At 20£ it is not worth replacing it, so beware
customer_reviews.author: Omar Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Ear pads are a con...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these about ten times and the ear pads have come off and despite hours of trying I cannot get them back on. A new set cost £19.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sennheiser Urbanite XL Over-Ear Headphones for iPhone, iPod, iPad - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:For Apple iOS Devices| Colour Name:Black

Folds Easily for Convenience, Your Style Your Choice, Urban Street Style URBANITE XL MOBILE STEREO OVER-EAR HEADPHONES FOR IPHONE/IPOD/IPAD
The URBANITE XL mobile stereo headphone range delivers an intense club sound, serving up massive bass but with Sennheiser’s uncompromising audio expertise ensuring excellent clarity through the entire frequency range.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE URBANITE XL SERIES
URBANITE XL headphones are for those that love their tunes heavy and love to look good, but who always respect great sound. The URBANITE XL range is ideal for staying connected on the move, with integrated in-line remote controls and microphones for taking calls and controlling music on Apple smartphones and tablets, with a dedicated version for iPhone/iPod/iPad. This is the sound your ears have been waiting for… Sennheiser URBANITE XL. Let your ears be loved.

FEATURES
 * Take your club sound with you – massive bass and clear treble
 * Tough companion – extra rugged for robust urban living
 * Stay connected – control your music and calls
 * Fits your lifestyle – fold them up and go 
 * URBANITE XL is wrapped in comfort – XL ear-pads simply feel better 
 * Available in your choice of colours - black, denim, sand, nation and olive
 * Compatibility - available with detachable cable with 3-button remote control and integrated microphone for either iPhone/iPod/iPad
 * Easy to store and bring along – the foldable design makes it easy to collapse and store in the supplied soft pouch
 * Bold design - Robust quality of premium stainless steel hinge and aluminium slider

DID YOU KNOW?
Sennheiser’s URBANITE XL headphones are the choice for great sound, deep bass, and urban style on the move.

SENNHEISER RECOMMENDS THIS HEADPHONE FOR...
… stylish, young users of Apple devices seeking bass driven sound and urban design.

COMPATIBILITY
URBANITE XL is compatible with Apple devices: all iPod, iPhone and iPad models. The full functionality of the Smart Remote Control is supported by the following models: iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5, iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS, iPad mini, iPad (3rd generation or later), iPad 2, iPad, iPod touch* (2nd generation or later), iPod classic, iPod nano *,** (4th generation or later), iPod shuffle *,** (3rd generation or later).

* Requires the latest iPod software.

** Only remote and voiceover functions.


Urbanite
For Apple iOSFor Samsung Galaxy 
Urbanite XL
For Apple iOSFor Samsung Galaxy Audio Channels Stereo Stereo Frequency response 16Hz – 22kHz 16Hz – 22kHz Transducer principle Dynamic, closed Dynamic, closed Design On-ear Around-ear Volume control Smart in-line remote Smart in-line remote Microphone type In-line Microphone In-line Microphone Pick-up pattern Omni-directional microphone Omni-directional microphone Connectors 3.5mm low profile angled plug 3.5mm low profile angled plug Weight 260 g 315 g Accessories Soft pouch Soft pouch 

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Sennheiser Urbanite XL Headphone
1.2m remote cable
soft pouch
feature_bullets: Take your club sound with you - Massive bass and clear treble
Tough Companion - Extra rugged for robust urban living
Fits your busy lifestyle - simply fold up to fit into your bag
Compatibility-Available with detachable cable with 3-button remote control and integrated mic for Apple iOS
Your choice of eye-catching colours and either on-ear or around-ear design  - customise your look and your sound
